name: Ghostly Slayer
description:
Made for a Game-Jam by Quaquoum, Herrenya and Alpaw Ghostly Slayer

Many souls want to go to the afterlife but they sometimes need a little help.
In a ghost town, some spirits are starting to get angry after waiting for so long, fortunately for them a little ghost decided to help as much as possible before going to the afterlife himself...
Help him reap as much souls as possible before his time runs out !

MUSICS :
- AdhesiveWombat - 8 Bit Adventure
- AdhesiveWombat - Pancakes

Controls

it is recommended to play with the arrows or ZQSD
ZQSD or Arrows > Movement
Left Click > Attack
Space Bar > Jump
